website_summaries.verdict: If you need a strong belt made from a better grade of leather, this Dickies belt is made to last.
pros: Good quality workmanship on the belt
A good value for the price
Holds up to daily wear and tear
cons: This belt won't fit with your normal size

customer_reviews.title: Not true Dickies product, "licensed accessory" by Randa Accessories
customer_reviews.text: Belt broke after 3 months of light use. Buckle appears to be cheap metal and a piece broke off where the tongue attaches, belt is currently useless. Contacted Dickies and the belt is a licensed product made by Randa Accessories so I will now wait 3-5 weeks to see if they will replace the belt under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than the original, despite the photo showing the original
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these in 2013 according to my purchase history. It was nice and thick, and lasted 6 years before the buckle broke off. I was really happy with it, so I bought another, but it's not even close to being the same. It's much thinner, and the leather is stiffer and lower quality. It looks almost nothing like the product photo. I'd be surprised if this lasts for a year of daily use. Then it'll be time to move onto something else. I imagine most of the 5-star reviews are from the previous version, because there's no way that this one is of any decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: scorpio88

customer_reviews.title: NOT real leather!! Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is very misleading advertising. This belt is NOT 100 percent leather. See picture showing what is stamped on the inside of the belt. I expected to receive a 100% leather belt as advertised. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: The Lunch Lady

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded his expectations
customer_reviews.text: I guess at some point your husband even makes you do his regular clothing shopping right? He would by the standard cheap belts from local clothing stores only to have them tear or break a few months later. I decided to try these out since they were rated number 3 for best brand to purchase a belt. I was not disappointed when we received the belt. it was packaged great, arrived on time and color and size were true to the description online. Husband really loves it too as he is an electrician so it was much needed to have a thick, sturdy belt.
customer_reviews.author: Tashia

customer_reviews.title: Great value!  Perfect thickness of leather for everyday wear and well stitched.
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Good thickness of leather for everyday wear and well stitched. The picture on Amazon currently for the tan belt represents the belt leather color and stitching correctly but the buckle itself is now a dark, gunmetal/dark-bronze color and a bit bulkier. Forget about trying to "tear" the tags off of your new belt -- have your pocketknife ready. I am 170# between a size 33-34 in the waist and the size 36 I ordered is PERFECT when not exercising your right to carry a force multiplier but fits a bit small when carrying something compact IWB. I wish there was a size 37.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look of the belt when I received it, but it quickly wore off the VERY thin top layer of the leather. I have a number of belts, so it wasn't even worn that much. Very cheaply made. Would avoid purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: not the belt pictured
customer_reviews.text: Quality belt, and it fits, but it doesn't look like the belt pictured. The belt pictured looks a little more worn in and leathery, the belt I got looks like a sterile version of this. The buckle is not antique like pictured, mine is almost black. The outer leather is a very dark brown as well, and feels almost plastic-y.
customer_reviews.author: Six Gun Matt

customer_reviews.title: CRACKS REAL QUICK
customer_reviews.text: I got this belt for work. I have had it for less than 3 days now and where the holes are it is certainly starting to crack already. Seem like it was genuine Dickies product but I am second guessing that now. Will not buy again!!! You may think the photo isn't bad but its only been 3 days!!
customer_reviews.author: J.R.H

customer_reviews.title: Whip it good!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this belt that hasn’t been said by the great poets of all time. What belt through yonder loop doth break? Who knew Shakespeare was a belt guy? I had him figured for suspenders and tube socks with sandals. That reminds me, who do you think was the first guy to chop off a T-Rexs ding dong and use it for a belt? I’m betting on Gernk myself. That brings me to my real point....Canadian belts are made from beaver tongues and should be outlawed. For shame....for shame!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jeff frederick

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product.
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area where brands and sizes are supplied based on sell through expectations. Probably not much different than other smaller cities. This belt was of high quality, not often seen in my city, and fit as hoped. I would highly recommend it. I’m not sure who decided that consumers want to buy the cheapest product available from developing regions, but this is not me. I want a product that has value and this one does. I stopped settling for what’s available in brick and mortar shops wanting low inventory to online shopping and thanks to Amazon’s clothing policy I’m hooked on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely different from the same belt I ordered in the past. Only the inside is genuine leather. Also it's shorter than before. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Durability has degraded
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this belt in 2013. After 6 years, the stitching finally started to come loose. I loved the durability of the belt so I purchased a new one in March of 2019. The new belt was definitely thinner than the older belt’s thickness. Sure enough, after about a year the new belt is folding over in the back. It is still a descent belt but the quality has degraded.
customer_reviews.author: Scarrlotcharms

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% Leather as Listed
customer_reviews.text: This belt is attractive and appears to be well made. This rating is 3 stars because of a serious problem with the listing. The listing is for a 100% leather belt. I have purchased 100% leather belts frim Dickies at least 5 times now. When this one arrived it is clearly stamped on the inside that it is artificial leather outer and real leather inner. You should not list something as 100% leather when it so clearly states in the product itself that it is not 100% real leather.
customer_reviews.author: Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Correct size, seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband because he is very rough on his belts, and where is them every single day to work, his finally snapped at the buckle hole I needed a new one, this one has done well I suppose, although it doesn’t seem to be quite as sturdy as I had expected of a dickies brand, The price wasn’t too crazy, I usually pay a little less at Ross but this one I was hoping would end up lasting longer, he’s used it for a month now and it seems to be holding up really well
customer_reviews.author: Paul A Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great "Work" belt! Well Worth the $20
customer_reviews.text: I have now have had 3 of this type of belt and they have all been fantastic for doing what a belt should do...hold my britches up! I love this belt for how durable they are and how comfortable they become. Being true leather and pretty thick, it can take a bit to break one in so it's soft around the waist. I bend and stand repeatedly during the day and my pants stay where I put them...UP!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great belt for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been without a durable, quality belt now for almost a year, up until when I received this one. Partly because you cannot find belts in my size in most stores, neither can you find them with the durability, thickness and quality that this belt was made with. I'll be buying a couple more to have on hand when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got this belt on the basis of Dickies strong brand reputation on making great work wear. After less then a month the leather is already cracked and flaking at where I buckle it. Rather disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Brock

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not quite right
customer_reviews.text: The description of this belt says to order a size larger than your pants size, which I did. However, the belt was not even long enough to close! Not sure what went wrong there but I returned it because of this. It was a bit wider than my preference as well. It seemed well-made and probably would have worked out just fine if the length had been right. I don't have anything else negative to say about the product itself but the sizing instructions don't appear to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: vortican

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality but not superior quality. The description at least when I bought it does not detail the strap width. I went by an answer in Q&A and it was a wrong answer and strap width is larger than I would have liked but functional. Additionally, I wish they would list the actual length of the belt. It wish pant size / belt size but I take different size pants depending on style and specifics.... I would much rather know the actual belt length.... meaning is size 40 actually 40in or 101cm long or is it some length Dickies decided fits a size 38 pant?
customer_reviews.author: VelocityTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my elderly father as he, like most currently, is under mandatory quarantine/shelter in place regulations. He is very happy with it, stating the quality appears excellent and it was exactly what he was wanting. This belt is non-reversible which is what he wanted as the last 2 reversible ones he has owned broke at the swivel. This review is for the Dickies Men's 100% Leather Jeans Belt with Stitch Design and Prong Buckle purchased through Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet G.

customer_reviews.title: Why have anything else?
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dickies belt and, unless they do something outrageous to change it, I'll never buy anything else. The reason this is my second belt is because after wearing my first belt for over 5 years and spending the last two years as a ranch hand, it is beginning to show some wear. So I got a new one now that I can wear when I put on some clean pants.
customer_reviews.author: William Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Good looking belt - all leather
customer_reviews.text: I just got the new belt and have not really had time to wear it for a long time. On the surface it looks like it will meet my needs. Have had had an opportunity to use the new belt. It is a little stiff and am hoping with use it will liber up.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Gallant

customer_reviews.title: It’s good, but I wouldn’t abuse it like I have.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for pretty heavy work with machines and machine oil. Only complaint is that the inner liner of the belt holder strip came off, but the machine oil probably dissolved the adhesive. More of a light weight belt really, but sufficient and nice. Now, I’m wearing it at a new, lighter job. And that holder strip without the inner liner... it’s still holding up as thin as it is, it hasn’t ripped apart. So, pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F

customer_reviews.title: NOT Genuine Leather At All !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product description is wrong. "Synthetic Leather" is not real leather and I am very dissatisfied. I will give it to Goodwill. There is nothing wrong with the belt itself except it was supposed to be Real Leather. Shame on you for your deceptive description.
customer_reviews.author: The Rabbit Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible invention, penicillin move over this thing is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Omg! This crazy invention changed my life. It works utilizing principles of gravity from what I can tell. Somehow it prevents my pants from falling off. Dont ask me how exactly, thats for the scientists to figure out all I know is that it works.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: average synthetic leather belt
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Somehow missed that it is synthetic leather. Probably because it was described as classic leather. Belt is okay for what I bought it for.(wearing around the house & with my work clothes.) It did have the musty leather smell when I opened the bag & took a little over a week before I didn't notice it too much. Typical of items produced in China or Asian countries. The fit is okay; the inside leather is rough & doesn't slide too easily.
customer_reviews.author: ted t

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a Dickies Men's Two Row Stitch Belt, BLACK (36) that was satisfactory, so I bought this same belt in TAN (36). Even though the they are both supposed to be 36 inches, the TAN belt was shorter by one inch. I noticed that the BLACK belt was made in China and the TAN belt was made in Guatemala. I can still wear it if I buckle it on the last hole. Dickies quality control has gotten terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. I loved the workmanship and the material used and the finish.. very good product. The only issue is I found it little shorter than expected. I have ordered based on the suggested size. Maybe I should have order additional size. But in any case I am going to keep it as I have already loved the product with current size. I am ok with little shorter size.
customer_reviews.author: Rupesh Shah

customer_reviews.title: Crappy plastic belt
customer_reviews.text: Ordered black version of same Dickies belt I own in brown. Despite description of "100% Leather“ the belt is obviously inferior quality and is stamped "synthetic leather top, coated leather lining" which means it is thin layers of plastic with miniscule amounts of real leather too thin to be of use. The brown version I bought a few years back is a solid strap of leather. If this is a counterfeit product then Amazon and Dickies should remove it. If it isn't, then shame on Dickies for selling out their brand. I for one will be wary of them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in NH

customer_reviews.title: Really good work belt.
customer_reviews.text: Can never find my size locally, common size that is always sold out. Great belt. Bought a new one to replace the same belt that is 5 years old. Holds up and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Borders

customer_reviews.title: 100% Synthetic Leather Top??? Vinyl..
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as 100% leather belt. I get it and inside the thin belt is stamped 100% Synthetic Leather Top. ( Vinyl-topped BELT) If your looking for a real belt look elsewhere. I bought their belts before some year ago and those belts where made of real leather with twice the thickness. Want real leather now you will have to pay somewhat more. Shame to put Dickies name on this. I'm returning it to buy a real belt..
customer_reviews.author: Rugame

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT 100% Leather
customer_reviews.text: This is not 100% leather. It is clearly stamped "COATED LEATHER TOP" "Synthetic Leather Lining" . For the price, I should have known, but it is definitely stated 100% leather in the item description.
customer_reviews.author: mtmomof5

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS BELT.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS BELT. Mine didnt last 3 weeks before the buckle broke, i came to realize its plastic coated in metal (see photo)
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great belt to large of a buckle.
customer_reviews.text: The leather on the belt is nice and it looks built to last. This belt is differently a built for the working man. However the reason I'm giving it 3 star is because the belt buckle is larger than your average buckle so when I'm sitting down or driving it stabes into my stomic and it's very uncomfortable. I wear a size 36 pant and purchased a size 38 belt and it's a perfect fit. Great belt all in all just to big of a buckle.
customer_reviews.author: Denver

customer_reviews.title: A bit smaller but still great
customer_reviews.text: The belt is well made, thick leather with great color. It does seem a bit smaller on the size but that could be due to how stiff it is at first. With most leather products I expect it to soften with use and fit well. The buckle is sturdy and don't see any reason that it will fail like cheap big box store brands.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt, but did stain the waist of khakis
customer_reviews.text: The belt looks great, but did stain the waist line of my pants. It's not a big deal to me, because that area of the pants is always covered by a belt. This is something I had seen in some of the other reviews, so it didn't really bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Shade Tree Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Solid construction, all leather. Appears it'll take all the daily stress it'll be subjected to. Yes, as mentioned in other reviews, the logo is a bit of a nuisance, but nothing of any great significance..My experience has always been that a man is more concerned about how fast he can get his belt undone, rather than how fast it hooks up, and this unhooks smooth!!
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this to anyone who doesn’t wish to switch this one for over a year. Guarantee you!
customer_reviews.text: Dickies put out a really good outdoor rugged product or I should say products plural. They’re belts are thick, really good stitching And durability! Recommend this to anybody who has a belt fetish or who has to switch belts every few months you won’t switch this one for over a year. Guaranteed
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: No animals died to make this belt.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this belt but after a few days I hate it just as much as the day it arrived. I do not know what this 100 percent leather is ... Really. It is stiff and fake feeling. It isn't breaking in but rather already showing signs of wear. It reminds me of the plastic belts that came free in the jeans in the 90's. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jeikamp

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in November and by April of the following year it was tearing and coming apart. The black "leather" covering was peeling off showing the green material underneath it. The holes in the belt stretched out and that is where the peeling and tearing started. It did fit as indicated and initially appeared tough, it just did not last.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Upon arrival it seems like great belt for the money, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This belt is nice and flexible, with a crackly "old leather" look to it that is very nice. The finish on the belt is somewhat gummy, a byproduct of this being laminated I assume, and it makes putting the belt in your pants somewhat of an annoying process, as it tends to bind because it is so flexible and gummy. Once in place, however, the belt works fine. I have just received this, so I'm not sure how it will wear over time, but I will update with that information.
customer_reviews.author: Evan WalkerTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Decent price. Good quality and feel. Simple, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a simple leather belt. Generally am a size 4 in women's sizes for pants. Ordered the 30 and it's a good fit--could do 32 also. ++ Easy delivery. ++ Good thickness and feel. ++ Nice colour. ++ Under $20. -- Over $15 (arguable). Will update on wear.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Stone

customer_reviews.title: Luck of the draw
customer_reviews.text: Well interestingly enough I originally orders 2 belts in different colors. I chose according to their recommendations. Way to small. I returned with no problem at all. I decided to reorder larger because I liked them. The new one fit fine but is not the same quality. Not sure why but it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Out4bhr

customer_reviews.title: Great belt
customer_reviews.text: I am a Republican. Which means that I have a job and needed a good belt to keep my pants up instead of letting them ride low with my underwear hanging out like some of the other folks. This belt works great! It’s a great belt for the hard working America loving people!
customer_reviews.author: lewdog

customer_reviews.title: Tan is not Tan and the belt leather has changed
customer_reviews.text: I own black and brown versions of this belt ordered from a few years ago. So I thought I would order the lighter colored tan version. I was disappointed to find that the tan was not tan, but not quite brown either. Also, have others have mentioned, the leather for this same belt model has become less supple. Two stars off, one star for the color, and one star for the leather.
customer_reviews.author: ssalava

customer_reviews.title: Overall a Pretty Good Belt
customer_reviews.text: This belt is quite large and thick. It seems well made and looks pretty nice. I wear this to work 5 days a week in a restaurant and it has served me well. It lasted a little under a year before the man made backing material started to tear around the hole I always use. Now only the leather front and rubber reinforcement are holding the belt together which made me decide to retire it. I decided to go with full grain leather from another brand the next time around since it seems like the man made part of the belt was the part that failed. Overall it was a pretty good belt.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to latch and unlatch
customer_reviews.text: This belt was purchased to hold up my pants. In order for it to hook. it needs to be pulled further past the hole than most other belts. Releasing the buckle is even more difficult. If you need the belt to be tight, then in order to release it, you have to pull it even tighter in order to get the hook exposed enough to release. All in all, Dickies makes a much better "work belt" that I \'ve used for years, and will use going forward.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Too Small But My Fault. Good quality Belt
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong size, but that was my fault. The belt is well made and I ended up giving it to my son. The leather is real and the buckle is heavy duty and doesn't seem like it would break after a lot of use. I would buy it again--just in a larger size. Remember, don't buy the belt in the size of your waist (although that should be how it works IMO) but buy it several sizes larger.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy work belts.
customer_reviews.text: These belts have worn well. Most of the belts I had tried in the past came apart, or delaminated. These have held up very well. The logo by the buckle is a minor annoyance, and is covered when the belt is worn. The company would be better served to "brand" their brand name into the leather where it can be seen, rather than have it attached to the belt where it interferes with putting the belt on.
customer_reviews.author: Gunky Fingers

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The belt loop that holds the belt after the buckle broke Belts in the past have lasted for years This one only made it a few months Sad craftmenship 😡
customer_reviews.author: Becky Blaser

customer_reviews.title: NOT LEATHER..
customer_reviews.text: THIS BELT IS COATED WITH A VERY THIN LAYER OF LEATHER..YOU WANT A REAL LEATHER BELT? you have to pay a little more.
customer_reviews.author: nickgi

customer_reviews.title: Beefy!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow they weren't kidding about industrial! It'll take awhile to break this in. I'm tired of flimsy belts for my husband that stretch like mad and crack and wear poorly. I think you could use this for a razor strap! Finally a product that actually means it when they say durable.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Berry

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin and the bucket is not well made
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find this being as thin as it was. The buckle is not well made and with the thin leather, the bar that is meant to go into the holes on the belt do not always hit the holes and can even slip through the outer edges and miss the belt. I would not recommend this belt. Invest in a thicker belt for larger guys.
customer_reviews.author: DinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Origin of product?
customer_reviews.text: These belts stand up just fine. No complaint about that. My problem is with origin of product. Cardboard label said the belt symbolises the quality, toughness, and pride that embodies the spirit of the American worker. But at the bottom small print."made in China". Which is it? OK. Did some calling. Seems as though the cardboard tag is made in China. Don't I feel dumb. Go made in USA!
customer_reviews.author: d.mckinney

customer_reviews.title: 2 year update: STILL an excellent leather belt!
customer_reviews.text: 3/6/19 - A quick update here. I ordered this belt almost 2.5 years ago and have worn it almost every day since then. I'm happy to report that it's holding up awesomely. Literally none of the stitching has come out and none of the holes have been deformed. The only signs of wear are in all the expected places: slight fading around the belt hole I always use; tarnish/shine on the tip of the metal tongue that goes through the belt hole; very slight bowing of the belt where it goes around my back. You can't go wrong with this belt. This is a great belt. Very sturdy looking but also very supple. Exactly as pictured and described.
customer_reviews.author: Tramontaner

customer_reviews.title: Truly industrial strength.
customer_reviews.text: This belt is truly industrial strength. It'll handle the wieght of walkie-talkie, tools and keys without showing fatigue. The reinforced area where the holes are located, make this the best belt I've used at work, and I've destroyed many that can't handle the weight of attachments mentioned. Five Stars!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MBarny

customer_reviews.title: Nice, and fits but on the very last hole
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality belt and buckle for the price, but it’s pretty short. I bought a size 38, which I wear comfortably in pants and other belts. This belt does fit, but it’s on the last hole with no room to add additional holes. I’d recommend buying a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wellman

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - Large, Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: High quality leather with heavy buckle. Great jeans belt. Bought two more colors after first one. Runs a little long but super well made at a great price. It is a metal buckle that set of TSA at airport. Easy to put on with just enough rigidity to not roll when sitting and standing all day.
customer_reviews.author: LakeMead Jim

customer_reviews.title: 44 vs 42
customer_reviews.text: There's a near major difference. The 42 fits on the last hole, there's two inches of belt left to fit in the belt loop. The 44 fits on the first hole, there's nearly ten inches of belt going past the belt loop. I can't review other size belts, but it'll probably be a similar issue with the rest of the sizes..
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Fard M.

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% leather as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Belt is not 100% leather as advertised, says right on it that it is coated and doesn't feel as durable as my full leather belt. Sizing isn't that great. I am a 34 wearing a 40 belt. a 38 would probably have been fine but the 36 which is my usual belt size was tight on its last hole.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than last belt
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 38 pants. Old belt was a 38-40. Dickies belt I ordered was a 40. It’s much shorter than my old belt. I can only fit on the 1st or 2nd hole. Seems like a decent belt so far. I hope I don’t gain weight or it won’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: WhitetailHunter23

customer_reviews.title: Great work belt!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, durable belt all around. I could wear it commercial roofing, or to church on Sunday. Great value. Would highly recommend. UPDATE: I ordered another Dickies belt and they sent me the wrong size, but I can squeeze into it so I'm keeping it. Great belts, still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yamez32

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: This is not a real leather!! This is a false advertisement saying it is genuine leather. Over a period of time, the outer layers of the belt peel off
customer_reviews.author: Raj N

customer_reviews.title: If you're ordering, order a size up.
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely shorter than I expected. But material wise I would say is just like any other leather belt that you might purchase at a Ross or some outlet store. It doesn't have any defects and doesn't seem like it would break easily. With the price only being $10 when I purchased it, I may actually buy a couple more just to keep as spares. Overall it's a decent belt but definitely isn't the best.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight, good durability
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight belt that holds up well to daily use with jeans and heavy weight pants. I've had other, more expensive leather belts that fail after much less use, fray or come apart at the edges and basically fall apart. I'll buy this one again when I need a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Casual Belt
customer_reviews.text: The belt is nice, thick leather and seems like it will last. I bought two- one to work around the house (and get paint on) and one for casual wear. I was impressed with the quality. It definitely fulfilled my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hanway

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely useless product
customer_reviews.text: I only tried it out as "Dickies" is a recognizable brand name. The 1st one broke in less than a week. It was promptly replaced and the 2nd one broke within a month. I didn't even ask for it to be replaced as I didn't want a 4th one to break unexpectedly. The weak point is the plastic that holds the buckle on. Tes, it's plastic, not leather. Avoid at all costs.

customer_reviews.title: Tough belt
customer_reviews.text: I have had the longer belt for 2 years now. I primarly use this belt for work. This belt has been with me through weight fluctuatations and have never failed me. The only reason I had to get a new belt was because of my current weight loss. Hopefully the new belt is as good as the old one!
customer_reviews.author: SupaChic

customer_reviews.title: This is not the belt I ordered !!!
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the belt described and pictured. I ordered a DICKIES BELT,but instead I received a TIMBERLAND BELT. This belt is similar but the buckle is different and it does not say DICKIES on it. I wanted a DICKIES BELT because it says DICKIES on it and because I wear DICKIES pants every day. I should have listened to the previous warnings mentioned on the web page. I'm very disappointed !!!
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: The belt's width is wider than a pair of Dickies pants belt loop so it's a pain to use and the unfinished edges grab along the way, I knew it was cheap but also badly designed, it's a goat ropers belt.
customer_reviews.author: Lokobous

customer_reviews.title: Dickies leather belt.
customer_reviews.text: I received the belt very quickly. The belt is a good belt I like the belt I recommend the belt you should buy the belt. The belt is real leather to not fake like the most of the ones in the stores these days.
customer_reviews.author: CrustalDestruction

customer_reviews.title: Great.... but breaks fairly easy
customer_reviews.text: I love it.... but broke it a day or two later. I accidentally stepped on it while changing and it broke the belt buckle (I'm only 175 lbs). Seems to be made out of cast brass or pot metal, which is brittle. The part that broke was about 1/8 of an inch but now it is useless
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Daily use , quality belt
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say , it came really firm and loosened up over time - which I prefer . Haven't ran into any issues , only modification I've had to do is it make another notch in between 2 , which is something I do for most belts . This allows me more comfort depending on if I have my shirt tucked in or not .
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and stretches out
customer_reviews.text: I wore this belt for work and by the end of the day had to tighten it by two notches due to the leather stretching. This went in the garbage. I guess you get what you pay for and I should have known better
customer_reviews.author: DonJ

customer_reviews.title: Not full leather!
customer_reviews.text: The listed on Amazon, the belt is "100% leather". When I got the belt it states that it is: "synthetic leather top with coated leather lining". When did plastic cows become a thing? The belt itself is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Guilbault

customer_reviews.title: Too Short
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 40" belt. I have a 39" waist. This thing BARELY buckles on the last hole....even then, it's tight. I'm not going to return it....just in case I finally decide to lose 30lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: great belt
customer_reviews.text: Quality material. Second attempt in ordering. The first was based on some reviews based on waist size and the size chart. On receipt of the belt, it was too small. Returned/exchanged and ordered a couple sizes up from my actual waist size (36) and ordered the (38). Although it fits, probably should have ordered a (40). The material is more flexible than some other leather belts that I have owned. Quality in the stitching and material. The only negative I found was in the size chart and some of the reviews related to the size and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt!
customer_reviews.text: This is a "real work belt" I have looked for one that is rugged like this for a long time. I like the reinforced buckle holes. The width is just right for my work pants. With how sturdy this belt is built, I am hoping it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Man

customer_reviews.title: Quality belt that fits and holds up.
customer_reviews.text: This is my everyday belt that I use with a pair of suspenders. It holds up great and has great craftsmanship in comparison to past products that have broken or failed to live up to the standard a product like this should have. I have liked it so much that I have two of them now and even waited for them to come back in to stock when my size was out of stock recently. I will keep buying them as long as I can. Great for bigger gentleman.
customer_reviews.author: Texas0204

customer_reviews.title: it fits!!!!  I am big and it isnt easy to find my size.
customer_reviews.text: I trust this belt every time I put my pants on. It has never let me down. and it looks fantastic. Sturdy materials ensure I will be wearing this belt for years. already have a year on it now and it looks new still.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: The belt seems to be good. Only have had it 2 weeks, so can't review the durability. I ordered a size larger and it barely had any belt left once it is through the belt buckle. So it definitely runs small.
customer_reviews.author: M.Cagnon

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't look/feel like leather, it looks fake
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't look/feel like leather, it looks fake, like a toy belt. Thin, doesn't feel very sturdy. Had I saw this in a store I would have looked for a better looking alternative. Not sure how long this one will last, it doesn't feel very durable but who knows.
customer_reviews.author: tmszewczyk

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to size
customer_reviews.text: Great belt. Pay attention to size when ordering however. My husband is a 36 but a belt 36 is like a 34. It was my own fault because it was in the details
customer_reviews.author: The Church’s

customer_reviews.title: The sizes of the Dickies belts was not consistent.
customer_reviews.text: The sizes of the Dickies belts was not consistent. I ordered a 4 inch smaller size after loosing weight. Both belts are from Dickies, but the new smaller belt more like 8 inches shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice belt and I'm glad I went with this one. Good quality, nice stitching, and fits nice and snug . I would recommend it to anyone in the market for a belt.
customer_reviews.author: Alan N.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: From a company like Dickies you would expect this belt to be tough but instead it is thin and the leather is too flexible to be a decent work belt. All it does is stretch.
customer_reviews.author: terry rube

customer_reviews.title: Size guide wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that the three stars this item received was solely because the size guide is WRONG. I bought this as a Christmas gift and used the size guide. The belt ended up not even coming close to fitting. I have no issues with the actual belt. It seems sturdy and came on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Lee Tyler

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the misrepresentation (false advertising) that claims this is made of 100% real leather. There may be a scrap of leather inside it, but the majority of it is SYNTHETIC LEATHER!
customer_reviews.author: K. O.

customer_reviews.title: Medium weight leather
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent leather belt, probably good for casual use. I was hoping for something a little more heavy duty. This is not heavy enough to hang tools, tapes on at work. I’ll use it for after work stuff.
customer_reviews.author: RDVC

customer_reviews.title: Leather? NOT
customer_reviews.text: This was written up as a LEATHER belt. It is actually 'synthetic leather top'...whatever that is. Did not return it because husband needed a belt ... his had broken ... and we are quarantined.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: No pants on the ground
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a new belt my son got a new belt my son likes his new belt my sons pants don’t fall off no pants on the ground pants on the ground he will not be looking like a fool with his pants on the ground
customer_reviews.author: Redman

customer_reviews.title: Product quality has been downgraded
customer_reviews.text: I've used Dickies belts for years. They've been good quality until the one I just go in. It's thinner and very rough on the inside of the belt. In the past, they've been buttery smooth. The suede belts wear out on the front and turn white. They look really bad just after a month which isn't what I want my clients to see. I'm really saddened to see this as Dickies has been my favorite belt brand.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Jack

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Husband needed a new belt for work , he said that the material seemed good and thinks it will last a long time . If it doesn’t , I’ll update my review
customer_reviews.author: dangstef

customer_reviews.title: Nice to wear a belt
customer_reviews.text: Wearing a belt had vastly improved my day-to-day life and given me increased confidence. I always used to wear pants or shorts with elastic waistbands such as Zubazz and sweatpants but ever since I got this belt I've begun to wear jeans, khakis and other types of advanced pants. As a result, I seem to get a lot more friendly reactions from people at work and at the store so I would definitely recommend trying a belt and there's no reason not to get this Dickies leather belt since it is completely adequate at performing its job.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Vuono

customer_reviews.title: Stains pants
customer_reviews.text: First time leaving a negative review because as a small business selling on Amazon (Nano-Ice cooling necklace) I understand how it impacts a product. This belt looks and feels great but it stains your pants.....see picture. Wear w dark color pants only.
customer_reviews.author: White

customer_reviews.title: It's a very basic black belt which is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn it for a few weeks now and it's holding up fine. It's comfortable, sizing was perfect, and it looks and feels nice enough for the price. I've paid more for belts that were not as nice as this one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Count Scotula

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy. Follow size Chart.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this belt for my husband. This belt exceeded my expectations. Great belt, durable, and looks great. Size chart is very helpful. He wears a size 44 and the chart recommended a 46. I was a little worried, but fitted great.
customer_reviews.author: Ruhbee

customer_reviews.title: Function, fit
customer_reviews.text: Waiting for product. Had in the past, expecting great results. Replacing after 3 years. Would have rcvd IF DRIVERS DELIVERED AS INSTRUCTED. Stolen off my front steps, requested and on label says deliver to rear door. Constant problem with Driver
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not solid leather
customer_reviews.text: Great belt and seems to be holding up well after a couple of months. It’s not solid leather and has some type of coating on it. I usually buy solid leather belts because they last forever. Time will tell if this will hold up as well. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: High quality leather and stitching
customer_reviews.text: I bought this belt for my brother in a size 32, only to come to find out, he's a 30! Still, it was no problem. He can still wear it snuggly, as is his preference, with two more holes to go even smaller as well as four more to go larger! This belt is very well made with double stitching and leather on both sides. I highly recommend it for a work belt or casual every day belt.
customer_reviews.author: Gary or StaceyJohnson

product_meta.title: Dickies Men's 100% Leather Jeans Belt with Stitch Design and Prong Buckle
feature_bullets: Wash by hand with damp cloth

CASUAL TIMELESS DESIGN: Adding a touch of style to your jeans or khakis is now a no-brainer. The belt strap features two rows of stitches on edges, a black-matte finish harness buckle and a pointed tip that finish off the classic silhouette of the belt.
100% LEATHER: Crafted from 100% leather, this high-quality leather belt gives you a nice and clean look with any looks. The sleek and smooth strap leather is perfect to finish off any of your outfit.
SIZING: For best fit, select belt size 2 inches larger than your pant size. For example, if your pant size is 34”, shop belt size 36”. Strap width 1 1/2".

DICKIES QUALITY: At Dickies we take pride in designing belts that are made for your everyday life. From work to family time we craft sturdy, yet fashionable belts that you can wear anytime and any wear. The buckle features a roller end with double prong.
